achievement.name: Goblin's Wares
achievement.desc: Purchase your first Basic Pack from the store.

line.text: Nice airship! Where can I set myself up?
Who is this smelly goblin?
Don't be like that. Come! I have something to show you!

achievement.name: Regular Customer
achievement.desc: Purchase three Basic Packs from the store.

achievement.name: Prologue
achievement.desc: Complete your training with the Raven!

achievement.name: Bury the Dead
achievement.desc: Complete 'The Elaria Expedition' campaign.

achievement.name: Field Training
achievement.desc: Complete the 'Rise of the Dead' campaign.

achievement.name: Source of Corruption
achievement.desc: Complete 'The Good, the Bad and the Fiery' campaign.

achievement.name: Necromancer's Fall
achievement.desc: Complete the 'Source of Chaos' campaign.

line.text: Uggghhhh, where am I?
It appears that this young Chaos mage was under some kind of mind control.
She seems to have gotten her wits, but the undead are now roaming without purpose and I am wounded. Choose a new hero to help lead your party.

achievement.name: Heart of the Woods
achievement.desc: Complete the 'Wyldwood Depths' campaign.

line.text: Thanks for the help! I was on my way to deliver these bounties when I came across those beasts.
Bounties? What kind of bounties are out here in this frontier wilderness?
There are many who do not follow a noble path, my friend. They raid where others would help.
Is there anything we can do to help? It sounds like this is a serious problem.
Not to mention lucrative. Just look at those rewards...
Here, if you can handle these I can make sure more follow. Consider it a token of gratitude from a fellow adventurer.

achievement.name: Hero of Elaria
achievement.desc: Complete the 'Chaos Contagion' campaign.

line.text: Grab the edge of the cache. Here we go. One... Two... LIFT!
WHOOOoooooOOOO!!! Who are you? Where am I?!
That doesn't look like a Heart of Blue Fire.
It's not, it's just an Aether creature.
C-c-commander Ursurio!? When did you get here?

achievement.name: Spirits of Blue Fire
achievement.desc: Complete 'The Glowing Grove' campaign.

achievement.name: Hero of Ascendancy
achievement.desc: Complete 'The City of Luminis' campaign.

achievement.name: Hero of Luminis
achievement.desc: Complete the 'Castle on the Rocks' campaign.

line.text: I am going to travel back to Elaria to report this to the expedition. That general re-appearing has me worried.
I agree. I will continue to travel with our friend to Karthos, maybe Aria has found more answers.

achievement.name: Hero of Shadow
achievement.desc: Complete the 'Karthos, Lair of Chaos' campaign.

achievement.name: Hero of Karthos
achievement.desc: Complete the 'Void's Ambush' campaign.

achievement.name: Hero of Tremors
achievement.desc: Complete the 'Eater of Rock' campaign.

achievement.name: Hero of The Void
achievement.desc: Complete 'The Void Core' campaign.

line.text: NOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!
It exploded! I've never seen anything that terrifying!
I don't want to see anything that terrifying ever again.
I have a distinct feeling that this was not the last we've seen of the void. This appeared to be but a mere avatar.
You're saying we might have to fight them again?
I am saying that is a very real possibility.

achievement.name: Welcome to the Swamp
achievement.desc: Complete the 'Swamp Lands' campaign.

achievement.name: Hero of Dawnglow
achievement.desc: Complete the 'Big Mama' campaign.

achievement.name: Seastone Explorer
achievement.desc: Complete the 'Tales from the Swamp' campaign.

achievement.name: Hero of Seastone
achievement.desc: Complete the 'Trial by Fire' campaign.

achievement.name: Conqueror of The Void

achievement.name: Rise to Power
achievement.desc: Upgrade a card.

line.text: SQUAK! Come back to the Airship soon and check out this new Arcane Dust!
You can use it to upgrade your cards and make them even stronger!
